name: Bloody Skyscraper
description: Bloody Skyscraper - climb as high as possible in skyscraper mode, unifying enemies and destroying everything in your path.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
